attributes.action: stop rejecting petitions that we the british public might want to sign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why do the government reject petitions, is it because they do not want to see what public feeling is about the subject, i think so

rejection.details: Please email your concerns to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
